tasks.label: ADMIN: Apply Backend Additive Router
args:
set -e
mkdir -p backend/routers
cp -f deedpro-admin-honesty-pass-bundle/snippets/backend/routers/admin_api_v2.py backend/routers/admin_api_v2.py
echo '✅ Copied admin_api_v2.py to backend/routers/'
echo '👉 OPEN backend/main.py and add:'
echo 'from routers import admin_api_v2\napp.include_router(admin_api_v2.router, prefix="")'

tasks.label: ADMIN: Apply Frontend Honest Page
args:
set -e
mkdir -p frontend/src/app
cp -r deedpro-admin-honesty-pass-bundle/snippets/frontend/src/app/admin-honest frontend/src/app/
mkdir -p frontend/src/lib frontend/src/types
cp -f deedpro-admin-honesty-pass-bundle/snippets/frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts
cp -f deedpro-admin-honesty-pass-bundle/snippets/frontend/src/types/admin.ts frontend/src/types/admin.ts
echo '✅ Frontend /admin-honest page installed.'

tasks.label: ADMIN: Dev (FE+BE)
args:
echo 'Starting backend & frontend…'
# Adjust these to your project’s commands
(cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000) &
(cd frontend && npm run dev) &
wait

tasks.label: ADMIN: Smoke
args:
set -e
echo '🔎 Curling endpoints (token required):'
echo 'curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $ADMIN_TOKEN" http://localhost:8000/admin/users/search?limit=1'
